text: LG Academy is a talent nurturing institution for the LG Group companies.
At LG Academy, we are focused on spreading and promoting
the LG Way, a unique set of guiding principles and actions
that are shared across all LG employees.
We provide education and training programs that enable everyone at LG
to embody the LG Way and acquire a wide range of skills and abilities.

the first thing that caught our attention was Amazon’s mission statement:

LG also has its ultimate business goal in creating customer value.

So, we trained all the team leaders and executives
in the product planning team the Working Backwards mechanism,
This is because the first thing you do
during the product development stage is to try to think from a customer’s perspective
and understand their expectations by asking “What do customers want?”.
So we chose the product planning team and their employees as the first target.
You start from a customer and make and validate all decisions
from the customer’s perspective quickly before moving on to the next step.
If it does not work, you go back to the customer for verification,
and this process repeats and moves on very quickly.
Since the training, “working backwards” has become
a common language in the product planning team.
We learned that we shouldn’t adopt the Working Backwards mechanism
as just a process or a tool, but rather, adopt it as organizational culture.
